channel.title: Moparscape 3.2 NPC and quest-lines where are they?
channel.description: Hi im kinda new and i downloaded moparscape 3.2 and when i spawned i was wondering why i cannot talk to NPC's and alot of them are missing. for example where it shows a quest on the map, the NPC is not there and if they are, i cant talk to them why is that? and also is there someway i can start my stats over to 1 and raise them up?

item.title: Moparscape 3.2 NPC and quest-lines where are they?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Moparscape 3.2 is no longer managed by the community, or anyone. It’s recommended you take a source & client from the Downloads section and to work on one of those.

There are thousands of beginner tutorials, and it’s highly recommended that you google before asking questions, as your question may have already been answered.

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape 3.2 NPC and quest-lines where are they?
